item.title: Installing Docker on FreeNAS 11.2
item.description: Docker on FreeNAS 11 It isn’t as simple as just clicking on for a docker service in the UI. You’re going to have to set up a VM yourself. Create Rancher VM Create a VM in the new UI, select Docker Host. This will create a Rancher VM that already has docker installed inside so you don’t have to hassle with installing. Go into the classic webui, select the VM you just created, then devices, and edit Pick the RAW item, select edit, then set a password.
